ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities include adding lazer mod articles, fixing duplicate wording on news posts, and adding podium and badge images to Sparxe's Two Key Event. The repository also saw standardization of various mod fields, rewriting of the Classic intro, and reformatting of key mod details. Furthermore, there were additions to the news section, including a 'happy holidays!' post and miscellaneous mod cleanups.

ppy/helm-charts.summary: The repository experienced updates to index.yaml, fixes to probe type comparisons, and the addition of probes configuration. Other notable activities include the addition of Octane pools, restructuring of octane and assets configurations, and enhancements to storage RWX documentation. The osu-web chart was also upgraded to 2024.1224.0, indicating ongoing maintenance and improvement of the repository.
